hero.description: I am a front-end developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional web applications. I have experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

about-me.title: Front-End, Web designer/developer
about-me.description: Motivated Junior Front-End Developer with practical experience creating responsive and user-friendly web applications through academic and personal projects. Proficient in HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React and Next.js with a solid understanding of UI/UX fundamentals. Eager to apply skills in a professional setting, contribute to collaborative teams, and grow through continuous learning and clean coding practices.
about-me.tools-title: Tools for building high-quality, accessible UI.
